page.title: 07THE TALBOT HOTEL, NEWNHAM
page.content: THE TALBOT STANDS ON THE CORNER OF THE KIDDERMINSTER AND WORCESTER ROAD WITH A CARPARK. THE BUILDING IS MADE OF BRICK AND ONLY HAS A SMALL GARDEN BUT NOT FOR PLAYING ON. IT IS OWNED BY WILLI AND ANN MERTENS. IT IS A GREAT BIG PUB WITH 7 PART TIME STAFF. WILLI MERTENS DOES ALL THE COOKING HIMSELF. IT IS OPEN FROM 11.30 AM TO 2.30 PM IN THE MORNING AND 6.30 PM TO 11 PM AT NIGHT AND IT IS OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK. THEY DO NOT HAVE MANY PEOPLE IN THE WEEK BUT ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS THEY HAVE ABOUT 70 PEOPLE. THERE IS A DART BOARD AND A POOL TABLE.THERE IS ALSO A JUKE BOX. IT COSTS ABOUT Â£2 TO Â£4 FOR A BAR MEAL AND THERE ARE TWO DINING ROOMS. 7 PEOPLE CAN STAY THERE. IT COSTS Â£10.75 FOR 1 PERSON A NIGHT. THEIR BEER COMES FROM BANKS,ANSELLS AND EVERTONS.
